root.name: Spider-Man 2: The Sinister Six
root.description: Critical ReceptionGame Informer gave the review scores of 8 and 8. Reiner wrote, "...The new developer, Torus Games, actually understands the Spider-Man world and the gameplay reflects it. Through incredibly smooth animation, Spider-Man can cling to anything, smoothly transition and stick to adjacent walls, and use his webbing for multiple tasks".Kato wrote, "...little not to like. Cling to everything; web anywhere".
